title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 46.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 46.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) These
regulations apply to tidal wetlands, as defined in section
25-0103
of the Environmental

Conservation Law, owned by the State of New York under the jurisdiction of the

Department of Environmental Conservation, hereinafter the department. (b) Activities permitted pursuant to
temporary revocable permits are not subject to these regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
46.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
